articles.title: With Just 3 Sentences, Amazon's CEO Revealed the Unfortunate Reason the Company Laid of 27000 People - Inc.

articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: A 'greenwashing' crackdown in Europe hasn't gone down well. Here's what you need to know - CNBC
articles.description: The EU says it is hoping to provide more clarity to consumers so that when a product is sold as green, they can trust that it is environmentally friendly.
articles.content: Greenwashing refers to the marketing practice in which businesses seek to capitalize on the growing movement for environmentally sound products by selling goods labeled as green that actually aren't.… [+6175 chars]
